title: Steel concrete reinforcing bars - production in the U.S. 2000 to 2017
summary: In general Production in million metric tons has fallen over the Year.
Production in million metric tons is roughly constant from 2005 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, and finally slightly increasing from 2009 to 2012.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Production in million metric tons, of value 7.28 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Production in million metric tons about 4.62 was reached at Year 2009
